text:
I have two questions. Im creating a site on an environment where i dont have the final domain. I want to create the theme, that when i switch the domain to HubSpot i dont need to change all the absolute links or images. So i need to have two variables:
1. Link-URL of Homepage (just the basic url of the page)
2. URL to Media-Folder - The URL of the media folder so that i can use the images of the folder inside a hubl-theme
Thank you so much!
The media is not tied necessarily to the domain, you can use teh HubSpot default urls for that. Later on you can change that in the settings and it will use the domain moving forward.
The url of the home page is somthing like `{{ company.domain }}`
might have found a hubl bug
I had the same mistake a few days ago
